about_the_game:
Prepare yourself for the thrill of the hunt. Steady your aim, hold your breath and pull the trigger. Your hunting skills will determine your success. Ultimate Hunting® offers a thrilling and perilous adventure, placing you in the role of a hunter. Expansive territories await your exploration. Immerse yourself in the lifelike environment, but stay vigilant—danger could be hiding behind any tree, bush, or rock.

EXPLORE THE WILDS OF SOUTHERN AFRICA

In the Southern Africa Hunting Reserve, an unparalleled adventure awaits. Immerse yourself in four unique biomes: wetlands, mountains, savanna, and dense forest. Encounter the majestic African bush elephant and stay alert, as danger lurks around every corner. This expansive map features 17 diverse animal species, including the Southern African giraffe, Cape hippopotamus, Southern lion, Cape buffalo, Nile crocodile, and many more.

Navigate this wild terrain with the guidance of Marjorie Holter, a young yet experienced huntress who knows the African savanna intimately. She will be your guide, manage the shooting range, and assign missions, appearing in cutscenes to enhance your experience.

Dejan, the taciturn lodge keeper and weapons expert, continues his father’s legacy by running the lodge and its shop. Enthusiastic about 80s and 90s music, he dreams of becoming an action movie star. With their help, prepare yourself for a hunting expedition that combines the thrill of the hunt with the raw beauty and challenge of the African wilderness.

JOURNEY THROUGH CALIFORNIA

Embark on an epic adventure through the diverse landscapes of the California Hunting Reserve. Explore four distinct biomes: swamps, mountains, Californian forest, and desert grasslands, each teeming with life and challenges. Encounter 17 different animal species, from the formidable California black bear and elusive Tule elk to the swift North American cougar and stealthy California mule deer.

Guiding you through this challenging terrain is Kam Davis, a stoic and seasoned hunter who deeply respects the animals and the land they inhabit. Kam, a legend at the hunting lodge, serves as your mentor, introducing you to the game world, leading you through tutorial sessions, and managing the shooting range. He frequently assists you via radio and occasionally appears in missions to ensure you're always on the right path.

Meanwhile, the ever-knowledgeable Roundabout Pete runs the lodge and its shop, where you'll stock up on essentials. Known for his vast knowledge of firearms and his penchant for storytelling and humor, Pete will also be your mission giver at crucial points in the game. With their guidance, prepare for a hunting expedition that blends the thrill of the chase with the majestic and untamed wilderness of California.

HUNT TOGETHER

Experience the thrill of the hunt with up to 16 players in Ultimate Hunting's multiplayer mode. Explore diverse landscapes in Southern Africa and California, working together to strategize and plan. Survive the unpredictable wilderness, teeming with majestic wildlife and hidden dangers. Always ensure your targets are fully identified, as accidents can occur in the wild.

CUSTOMIZE YOUR WEAPONS

As a hunter, adapting your technique and weapons to specific animals is crucial. Choose from a vast array of hunting gear—from bows and crossbows to powerful firearms ideal for big game hunting. Customize your weapons by selecting the right ammunition, caliber, scope, and more!

Pick from ten rifles (semi, bolt, or lever), four shotguns, two revolvers, two bows, and two crossbows. Each weapon offers multiple customization options, including a wide range of caliber choices for firearms.

Think your weapon isn't powerful enough? Check if you can swap the caliber and barrel. Tailor your weapons to your exact preferences and ensure you're always prepared for the hunt!

ULTIMATE HUNTING GEAR COLLECTION

Ultimate Hunting offers an extensive range of in-game gear to enhance your hunting experience. Adapt your strategy with 14 different callers, including the Antelope Call, Boar Squealer, Deer Grunt, and Turkey Box Caller, ensuring you're ready for any situation. Enhance your approach with ten specialized urine sprays, such as Urine Spray - Warthog, Urine Spray - African Buffalo, and Urine Spray - Black Bear, to attract your target species more effectively.

Additionally, utilize three types of bait: sweet corn, grain mixed with apples, and blood with flesh to lure various game. Equip yourself with three models of binoculars—FullSight 8x42, Watchfield 8x56, and Horizon 18x56—along with the Stalker 20-60x60 Spotting Scope and the EZ-Distance Rangefinder for optimal spotting and ranging capabilities.

For precision shooting, choose from two collimators and seven rifle scopes, ranging from the Pureview 4x30 to the Falcon Eye 6-24x50. Not to mention crossbow scopes and bow sights!

Select from 26 different calibers of ammunition, from .17HMR to 700 Nitro Express, nine different shotgun calibers, and 11 various arrowhead weights, including multiple types of arrowheads and arrows. With such a wide variety of gear, you can tailor your hunting loadout to any challenge the wilderness throws at you.

OBSERVE, CHOOSE, RESPECT

One of the most captivating and authentic experiences in Ultimate Hunting is observing herds in their natural habitats, where you can encounter both young and mature animals. Always perform a proper observation, as not every animal should be hunted. Hunting a doe with calves can do more harm than good, so always be mindful of your hunting ethics.

To select a proper specimen, you can use bait to attract animals, allowing you to make careful observations and choose the best trophy. However, when you get closer, ensure you are fully aware of your surroundings. Imagine the surprise of encountering a giant black bear enjoying the corn and apples instead of the expected deer—it certainly won't be thrilled about the encounter…

STAY HIDDEN, HUNT BETTER

Blend in with your surroundings, mask your scent, and reduce noise. The success of a hunt often hinges on details such as your outfit, which should be suited to the weather conditions and environment. In Ultimate Hunting™, you'll have various clothing options that affect how animals detect you. Avoiding detection requires you to hide from an animal’s sight, smell, and hearing. Use natural barriers like terrain, rocks, trees, tall grass, and bushes to limit visibility, and ensure your camouflage matches the surroundings. Pay attention to wind direction, your movement, and the noise of your weapons. In quiet environments, animal hearing is more acute, while noisy surroundings can dull their senses. Thoughtful camouflage and strategic movement are key to a successful hunt.

UNIQUE TROPHIES WITH RAGS

The Random Antler Generation System (RAGS) in Ultimate Hunting ensures every trophy is unique. Using advanced bone-based models and procedural textures, RAGS creates one-of-a-kind antlers, horns, and tusks for each animal species. This revolutionary system guarantees no two trophies are ever the same, providing players with an unparalleled hunting experience.

ENGAGE WITH REALISTIC WILDLIFE

In Ultimate Hunting, animals exhibit unique behaviors and realistic reactions, creating an immersive experience. The game features animals of varying sizes, with heavier ones appearing larger, adding to the realism. Animals respond authentically to shots, allowing players to discern if a hit is fatal or superficial through detailed animations.

Animals move, graze, and fight naturally, with finely tuned senses of sight, smell, and hearing. This realism requires players to adapt their hunting strategies based on the specific animal they are pursuing, providing a dynamic and engaging gameplay experience.

Players will face predators that stalk and attack if caution is not exercised. Large predators can track players, making awareness, proper camouflage, and scent eliminators crucial. Avoiding tall grass, where ambushes are common, is essential. Additionally, medium and big game animals like buffalo and elephants can charge and injure or kill the player if they feel threatened.

There are three types of need zones: feeding, watering, and resting. These zones are dynamically created each time the game is launched. The system generates vegetation and assigns zones for animals to feed and rest based on predefined vegetation types. This dynamic approach ensures that players must explore and adapt, as favorite hunting spots will change over time, encouraging a realistic and varied hunting experience.

REALISTIC WEATHER CONDITIONS

In Ultimate Hunting, rain can create temporary water zones, allowing animals to drink from puddles. The game also features a 24-hour day cycle that affects animal behavior. Prepare for varying conditions, from blazing sun to heavy storms, which impact visibility and noise. Adapt your strategy as the weather and time of day shift, enhancing the immersive hunting experience.

REAL HUNTING ADVENTURES AWAIT

And that's not all—Ultimate Hunting offers numerous features and functions that allow players to learn about animal behaviors, experience the thrill of the hunt, and relax in stunning natural landscapes. Dive deep into this immersive world, where every hunt is a new adventure, and every moment brings you closer to nature. Where each virtual action captures the true essence of hunting: Real, Brutal, and Unforgettable.

name: Ultimate Hunting®

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-6100 / Core™ i5-2500K or AMD Ryzen™ 3 1200
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon™ RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change during development
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-7600K / Core™ i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen™ 5 2600X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® RTX 3070 or AMD Radeon™ RX 6700 XT
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: Requirements may change during development

short_description: Where each virtual action captures the true essence of hunting: REAL, BRUTAL, UNFORGETTABLE. Embark on a hunting expedition, returning with valuable trophies and memorable experiences. Customize your gear and adapt your hunting techniques to explore vast, realistic environments.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
